  • Constructor Details

    • PostModel

      public PostModel​(int iD, String title, String content, CategoryModel category, Date date, int authorID, String authorName, Date updatedDate, int updatedBy, List<RatingModel> ratingScore, String keywords, List<CommentModel> comments)
      Non-Default Constructor
      Parameters:
      iD - - record key identifier
      title - - title of post
      content - - content of post
      category - - category the post belongs
      date - - creation date
      authorID - - foreign key id to user
      authorName - - author name that created post
      updatedDate - - most recent modification date
      updatedBy - - most recent post modifier user id
      ratingScore - - list of ratings associated with post
      keywords - - string of keywords (#)
      comments - - list of comments users made regarding post

      Non-Default Constructor (Blank)
      Parameters:
      input - - assigned to user id (typically -1)
